name: Bloom (aseaboyer)
description:
Lucky Safari is my entry into the a game by its cover 2018 game jam.
More details are available here: https://itch.io/jam/a-game-by-its-cover-2018

How to play:
Click empty tiles to plant a flower. Harvest rows or columns of the same color and/or shape before they expire. Score bonus points with bigger combos! Keep playing to beat your high scores!

Made by: Andy Seaboyer (@AndyMakesThings)

Sound files created by artists on: https://freesound.org/
